name: numberFireNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: numberFire gives you the best sports news and analysis to help you get an edge building your lineups and becoming a smarter fan. Powered by the numberFire platform and content, We can give you breaking news and major updates across all the 4 major sports and college football and basketball.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
